tuning_runs.notes: OVER BUDGET by 11.1 min. Score -0.0104 vs baseline. NM polish added more time than CMA-ES saved.

key_finding: Reducing CMA-ES fevals to add more NM polish is NOT beneficial. CMA-ES convergence suffers with fewer fevals, and NM polish adds more time than CMA-ES saves. Baseline (20/36 fevals + 8 NM) is optimal budget allocation.
